data.title: The Penguins Of Madagascar
data.meta_description: If you don’t know what this is, then man did you miss out. Possibly one of the best cartoons to ever air on Nickelodeon. Though the show has suffered a fate similar to that of Manfredi and Johnson, it lives…
data.text: If you don’t know what this is, then man did you miss out. Possibly one of the best cartoons to ever air on Nickelodeon. Though the show has suffered a fate similar to that of Manfredi and Johnson, it lives on, through memories, reruns, and morally questionable cartoon streaming sites. Now granted the movie was… okay. It doesn’t hold a regurgitated candle to this masterpiece of a cartoon. So what are some of your favorite moments? What characters do you remember most? How awesome of a villain is Dr. Blowhole? (Okay, we all know the answer to that one) What other questions or comments can you think of to further discussion?
